        public float distanceAt(int x,
                        int y)
        Parameters:
        x, - x coordinate of the sample
        y, - y coordinate of the sample
        Returns:
        the horizontal distance from the ObserverPosition to the index x, y, in meters
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the sample is not valid

      • distanceAt

        public float distanceAt(int x,
                        int y,
                        float d)
        Parameters:
        x, - x coordinate of the sample
        y, - y coordinate of the sample
        d, - default distance in meters
        Returns:
        the horizontal distance from the ObserverPosition to the index x, y or the default distance d if the sample is not valid, in meters
